          <title>
            <string language="hu">Szabályos hatszög- ábra</string>
            <string language="en">symmetric hexagone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">symmetrisches hexagone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">hexagone symétrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">hexagone symmetric</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">συμμετρικό hexagone</string>

            <string language="hu">A szabályos hatszög forgásszimmetrikus tulajdonságának szemléltetése.</string>
            <string language="en">illustration of features of symmetric hexagone</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">9. osztály,  kép,  </string>
            <string language="en">9. class   picture,</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abbildung der Merkmale des symmetrischen hexagone</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">illustration des dispositifs du hexagone 
symétrique</string>
          </description>

symmetric</string>

simétrico</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">9. image de classe,</string>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
